file_content.text: Leave me, now. I have important matters to attend to.
Yes, my droids reported very favorable results. I should have plenty of specimens to begin my research.
Your service has been perfectly adequate. I require nothing else at the moment. Take your reward and be out of my sight.
Yes, my lord.
My work deserves better.
You'll take what I offer, and be glad for it. Now go.
Your attitude is pathetic.
I told you to get out of my sight. Now.
Subdue Force-sensitive Esh-kha for me, and you will be well rewarded.
Blasted, worthless fools... you! You look hale enough. I have a task for you.
My servants were meant to capture live Esh-kha for my personal study. They failed. I will give you the opportunity to succeed in their place.
Yes, my lord.
With pleasure, my lord.
Why study the Esh-kha?
These are creatures with power, and a hunger for conquest that rivals our own. I think they are worthy of study.
Seems pointless to me.
Do not trifle with me. My patience is running thin.
Now, I will not settle for any Esh-kha you might find. Only those talented in the Force are worthy of my attention.
Batter them down sufficiently, and this device will fully subdue them. My droids will collect them afterward. I'd best be pleased with the results.
Of course.
Give me a reason to do this.
Some monetary compensation is in order, I suppose--provided you do not disappoint me.
Do not return until your task is done.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
If you are incapable of even this meager task, get out of my sight and stop wasting my time!
We have nothing to discuss.
